Detailed Description

Helper class which automatically Locks the given mutex.

This helper class automatically locks the given mutex in the constructor and unlocks the mutex in destructor. This class is useful if the code between mutex lock/unlock may return or throw an exception, then the mutex be automaticlly unlocked in such case.
